thread.title: Man United ace Paul Pogba takes dig at Man City ahead of Liverpool showdown
thread.title_full: Man United ace Paul Pogba takes dig at Man City ahead of Liverpool showdown

title: Man United ace Paul Pogba takes dig at Man City ahead of Liverpool showdown
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Man United ace Paul Pogba takes dig at Man City ahead of Liverpool showdown PAUL POGBA insists Manchester United's rivalry with Liverpool is like no other for his side in the Premier League. PUBLISHED: 22:33, Thu, Jan 12, 2017 | UPDATED: 22:48, Thu, Jan 12, 2017 
Manchester United have enjoyed a resurgence under Jose Mourinho in the past six weeks. 
They will be aiming for their seventh league win on the trot when they host long-standing adversaries Liverpool at Old Trafford on Sunday (4pm). 
Pogba , who signed for the Red Devils last summer for a world-record fee of Â£89m, certainly wants to have the bragging rights. GETTY Paul Pogba is relishing facing Liverpool GETTY Manchester United are flying under Jose Mourinho Manchester United player ratings against Hull City in the EFL Cup Tue, January 10, 2017 Express Sport brings you Manchester United's player ratings from the first leg of their EFL Cup semi-final against Hull City Man Utd via Getty Images 1 of 15 Who shone for Manchester United against Hull City? The history of fixture is well known. It is a big derby, more so than Manchester City Paul Pogba 
And in describing the importance of the clash, he aimed a subtle dig at Manchester City too. 
"The history of fixture is well known. It is a big derby, more so than Manchester City," Pogba told BBC's The Premier League Show . 
"The atmosphere is always very special. GETTY Paul Pogba is hoping Manchester United can silence Jurgen Klopp's men 
"You want three points against any team, but it is more special when it comes against Liverpool." 
United currently sit sixth in the table, with Liverpool four places above them and five points better off. Related articles
